Première année: Tronc commun en Sciences: First year: Common core in Management Sciences
Le Mastère professionnel: The Professional Master in Private Business Law represents a path that students can choose after obtaining a License in Private Law. It aims to enable students to acquire skills focused on the different aspects of business life and to familiarize themselves, in particular, with contractual, tax, social and company law techniques. This training is intended to provide students
La maîtrise des concepts de base relatif: Mastery of basic concepts relating to corporate law.
La confrontation des connaissances théor: Confrontation of theoretical knowledge with the business world.
La contribution à la structuration du cu: Contribution to the structuring of the acquired training course.
Ce Mastère: This Master aims to provide students with the knowledge necessary to practice the trades. in relation to the field of private business law.
Conditions d'accès à la formation et pré: Conditions of access to training and prerequisites
Le parcours permet de former aux princip: The course allows training in the main professions of business law
Avocats d'affaires, magistrats (sous rés: Business lawyers, magistrates (subject to success in the ISM and ISA competitions).
Juristes dans les institutions publiques: Lawyers in public and private economic institutions.
Formation initiale, Formation continue,: Initial training, Continuing training, Work-study training
Premiere année mastère Professionnel en: First year of Professional Master in Private Business Law
Deuxième année mastère Professionnel en: Second year Professional Master in Private Business Law
Stage professionnel et mémoire de fin d’: Professional internship and end of studies thesis
Descriptif des stages et des activités p: Description of internships and practical end-of-study activities
Le stage professionnel: The professional internship is compulsory for students who have validated the semesters of study (M1 and M2). Students who occupy positions are required to certify this in order to be spared the professional internship. On the other hand, they are required to develop a thesis subject that corresponds to the training required in this master's degree.
objectif du rapport: The objective of the internship report is to show the ability to analyze, synthesize and present a project. It reflects the student's ability to use the knowledge acquired during his university studies in order to relate it to the practical questions observed during his internship.
Cabinets d’avocats, Compagnies d’assuran: Law firms, Insurance companies, Oil companies, Banks, Stock exchange, etc.
Inter liaisons entre les semestres du pa: Inter links between the semesters of the course, gateways (to be specified), evaluation and progression
Les modules prévus: The modules planned for the three semesters of study are complementary and come together around fundamental questions related to international relations and the diplomatic field. The choice of thesis subject during the 4th semester aligns with these questions to the point of confronting them concretely during the professional internship in the diplomatic world.
